        Constructor accepting the configuration parameter

        It accepts the default HadoopDFS URL of the format hdfs://hostAddress:port

        Parameters:
        fsDefaultName - HadoopDFS URL

    • Method Detail

      • moveToHDFS

        public boolean moveToHDFS(String sourcePath,
                          String destPath)
                   throws IOException
        Copies a particular file from user's local machine to HDFS

        This method will first check, if the file with the same name as source file already exists in HDFS. If it exists it will overwrite the existing file in HDFS

        Parameters:
        sourcePath - path of the source object; like a particular file (residing on the local machine) that needs to be moved to HDFS
        destPath - destination path (of HDFS of the format) where the files need to be copied
        Returns:
        true if file is successfully copied else false
        Throws:
        IOException

      • moveFromHDFS

        public boolean moveFromHDFS(String sourcePath,
                            String destPath)
                     throws IOException
        Copies a particular file from HDFS to the user's local machine

        This method will first check, if the file exists in HDFS. If the file does not exists in HDFS throws FileNotFounException. Overwrites the file if the file with same name exists in user's local machine

        Parameters:
        sourcePath - path of the source object; like a particular file (residing in HDFS) that needs to be moved to user's local machine
        destPath - destination path (of user's local machine) where the files need to be copied
        Returns:
        true if file is successfully copied else false
        Throws:
        IOException
